backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three gallery-related features and associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing purpose and behavior of each component and utility.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global styling defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with basic metadata and root mount div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app wrapper composing all sections, top navigation, music toggle, and background styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing a romantic quote and caffeine.ai attribution with dynamic year and hostname.
frontend/src/components/MusicToggle.tsx: Floating audio play/pause button managing a looping background track with tooltip guidance.
frontend/src/components/sections/Countdo: Countdown timer section showing live time remaining until Feb 18, 2026 with reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with title, intro text, reveal animation, and button scrolling to the story section.
frontend/src/components/sections/LoveNot: Animated section displaying a toggleable love note revealed by clicking a mail icon.
frontend/src/components/sections/MemoryG: Image gallery with modal dialogs showing enlarged photos and captions using scroll reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/OurStor: Timeline-style section describing story milestones with animated entries and a closing quote.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reasons: Grid list of reasons with icons and scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/Surpris: Password-gated surprise message that unlocks special content after correct input.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Fixed responsive navigation bar with desktop links and mobile sheet menu using smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: Hook providing a live countdown to a target date with time breakdown and completion flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks enabling login, identity management, and persistence via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook detecting the user's reduced-motion preference via media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollReveal.ts: Hook revealing elements on scroll using IntersectionObserver with reduced-motion fallback.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, global fonts, and various animation and gradient utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Provides a smooth-scrolling function that offsets scroll position to account for a fixed header.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
